title: Tin Foil Hat #41: Truth Serum with Rachel Evans
description:
Thank you for tuning into another crazy ass episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli.
Before we get into this episode, Ryan and I are proud to announce the first ever Tin Foil Hat Comedy Night and Swapcast with Greg Carlwood and the Higherside Chats live at the Ice House in Pasadena Oct 10th at 8pm! That's right a night of conspiracy stand up comedy in the Main Room of the Ice House with Eddie Bravo, Brendon Walsh, Gareth Reynolds, Vanessa Johnston, Shaan Joshi and John Tole. Then in the other room of the Ice House, we will be doing a live swapcast with Higherside Chats' Greg Carlwood! Come out and see two your favorite conspiracy podcast do one funny ass podcast live! Tickets are 20 bucks for the stand up show and 10 bucks for the live swapcast! Get your tickets now at icehouse comedy.com
Now for this fun crazy episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli and Ryan Davis. The boys welcome the queen of conspiracies, Rachel Evans! On this episode we discuss....
1) The History of the Comedy Store
2)Ladies Night at the Satanic Temple
3)People going missing in our National Forrest
4) Growing up in the country
5) Being an Eagle Scout
6) Weird shit you can find on the Dark Web
Finally special thanks to DJ Buddy for coming down, running the board, helping to record and doing a ton of editing. You my friend are a G!
Enjoy the podcast!
